summary: The Reproductive Health Travel Fund Act of 2025 authorizes grants to eligible entities to cover travel-related expenses and logistical support for individuals seeking abortion services. The Secretary of the Treasury will award grants to organizations for expenses including travel, lodging, meals, childcare, translation services, and lost wages.  The bill prioritizes entities serving individuals in areas with abortion bans or restrictions. It also includes provisions for organizational costs and mandates annual reports to Congress, while protecting beneficiaries and providers from legal action. Funding of $350 million is authorized annually from 2026-2030.
